h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat
content: The closest one in the tunnel entrance guards a **Treasure Chest** with a Mind Cor and materials inside, but try to take them on one at a time to make things easier. Follow the tunnel path to find a green Wisp, and it will empty out right at the larger tunnel entrance leading to the next main area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
The closest one in the tunnel entrance guards a **Treasure Chest** with a Mind Cor and materials inside, but try to take them on one at a time to make things easier. Follow the tunnel path to find a green Wisp, and it will empty out right at the larger tunnel entrance leading to the next main area.
